title: Account takeover via leaked session cookie
content:
Summary:
You are disclose for me you session
Description:
you are gevi me your session on last report
I am can use your session(sorry)
███
████████
█████████
Impact
HackerOneStaff Access, i can read all reports @security and more program
steps: Obtain the session cookie from the victim, either through a leak or other means.
Use the session cookie to impersonate the victim and gain unauthorized access to their account.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the unauthorized use of a leaked session cookie to take over a user's account, granting access to sensitive information and functionalities.
reason: The attack is straightforward, involving only the interception and use of a session cookie without any complex interactions or manipulations of application states.
